sentences.en: “The . . . matter was pretty much dying down”(&b{John Strahinich})
sentences.cn: “材料差不多要没了”(&b{约翰·斯特拉希尼奇})

sentences.en: a pretty little girl
sentences.cn: 漂亮的小姑娘

sentences.en: Despite the poor weather the fishing has been pretty good.
sentences.cn: 尽管天气恶劣，却渔获颇丰。

sentences.en: I had a pretty good idea what she was going to do.
sentences.cn: 我很清楚她会怎么做。

sentences.en: I'm an orphan and pretty much grew up on my own.
sentences.cn: 我是个孤儿，差不多是靠自己长大的。

sentences.en: I’m pretty sure he’ll say yes.
sentences.cn: 我相当肯定他会同意的。

sentences.en: I'm pretty sure they slept together before they were married.
sentences.cn: 我敢肯定他们结婚之前就上过床了。

sentences.en: if she could get sponsors, she would be sitting pretty.
sentences.cn: 如果能得到赞助，她会极占优势。

sentences.en: It's hard to take them seriously in their pretty grey uniforms.
sentences.cn: 他们穿着帅气的灰色制服时，很难对他们郑重其事起来。

sentences.en: Jean is pretty, of slim build, with blue eyes.
sentences.cn: 珍妮非常漂亮，身材苗条，有一双蓝色的眼睛。

sentences.en: Maria looks much prettier with her hair cut short.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚把头发剪短好看多了。

sentences.en: She decided that her doctor's advice sounded pretty good.
sentences.cn: 她认为医生的建议似乎很不错。

sentences.en: She still looks pretty miserable.
sentences.cn: 她看上去还是非常痛苦。

sentences.en: She's going to be fine. She always was pretty strong.
sentences.cn: 她会好的。她一直都很强壮。

sentences.en: the case is pretty well over.
sentences.cn: 这案子差不多结束了。

sentences.en: The Daily Express describes Dr Carey as a pretty tough nut.
sentences.cn: 《每日快报》把凯里医生说成是特别难对付的家伙。

sentences.en: The effect is soft and pretty rather than drop-dead sexy.
sentences.cn: 给人的印象是柔和俏丽而不是吸人眼球的性感。

sentences.en: The guard eyeballed him pretty hard despite his pass.
sentences.cn: 虽然他有通行证，卫兵还是直勾勾地盯着他。

sentences.en: The policeman smiled at her. "Pretty dog."— "Oh well, thank you."
sentences.cn: 警察冲她笑了笑，“这狗真漂亮。”——“哦，谢谢。”

sentences.en: The political pressures to do something are pretty enormous.
sentences.cn: 要求采取行动的政治压力非常巨大。

sentences.en: The quilt has pretty, scalloped edges and intricate quilting.
sentences.cn: 这条被子有漂亮的荷叶饰边，而且绗缝活做得也很精致。

sentences.en: You know pretty well everyone here, one way or the other.
sentences.cn: 无论如何，这里的每个人你肯定都很了解。

words.tran_cn: 漂亮地，可爱地；恰如其分地

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)占优势的，处于有利地位的
漂亮男孩；脂粉气十足的男人；矫揉造作的男子

phrases.phrase: pretty much (或 nearly 或 well)

phrases.tran_cn: 一大笔钱；大数目之金钱
求求你（强调或讨好的表达方式）
[美国俚语]容易的；便当的；合算的

trans.tran_cn: 漂亮的，美丽的，赏心悦目的
trans.tran_en: a woman or child who is pretty has a nice attractive face
fairly or more than a little

trans.tran_cn: 有吸引力的事物（尤指饰品）；漂亮的人
